name: The Life Chapter of Banana Cat
name_original: The Life Chapter of Banana Cat
description:
The story of Banana Cat where in his new chapter of life, he is trying to fight the fear of toilets using Bananas. 

Will you defeat the evil?

CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS - movement 

SPACEBAR - jump 

RIGHT CLICK - shoot (useless)

Try you best, the game is a bit hard. Speedrun test is 1min 44 seconds.

Game made for the 2022 Halloween Game Jam hosted by Spelkollektivet. 
[Theme - chapter/chapters]
